issue.title: [C++] Linking static zstd library fails on Arch x86-64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3734](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3734). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
zlib installs the static library into the ${CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR} which is lib64 on 64-bit systems. We should also look at this path when we're linking.
